triple_product_permutation:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.dot_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.dot_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/-- Cyclic permutations preserve the triple product. See also `triple_product_eq_det`. -/
theorem triple_product_permutation (u v w : Fin 3 → R) :
    matrix.dot_product u (cross_product v w) = matrix.dot_product v (cross_product w u) :=
  by
  simp only [cross_apply, vec3_dot_product, Matrix.head_cons, Matrix.cons_vec_bit0_eq_alt0, Matrix.empty_vecAppend,
    Matrix.cons_val_one, Matrix.cons_vecAlt0, Matrix.cons_vecAppend, Matrix.cons_val_zero]
  ring
#align triple_product_permutation triple_product_permutation
triple_product_eq_det:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.dot_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr![ ,]» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr![ ,]» -/
/-- The triple product of `u`, `v`, and `w` is equal to the determinant of the matrix
    with those vectors as its rows. -/
theorem triple_product_eq_det (u v w : Fin 3 → R) :
    matrix.dot_product u (cross_product v w) =
      Matrix.det («expr![ ,]» "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr![ ,]»") :=
  by
  simp only [vec3_dot_product, cross_apply, Matrix.det_fin_three, Matrix.head_cons, Matrix.cons_vec_bit0_eq_alt0,
    Matrix.empty_vecAlt0, Matrix.cons_vecAlt0, Matrix.vecHead_vecAlt0, Matrix.vecAppend_apply_zero,
    Matrix.empty_vecAppend, Matrix.cons_vecAppend, Matrix.cons_val', Matrix.cons_val_one, Matrix.cons_val_zero]
  ring
#align triple_product_eq_det triple_product_eq_det
leibniz_cross:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/-- The cross product satisfies the Leibniz lie property. -/
theorem leibniz_cross (u v w : Fin 3 → R) :
    cross_product u (cross_product v w) = cross_product (cross_product u v) w + cross_product v (cross_product u w) :=
  by
  dsimp only [cross_apply]
  ext i
  fin_cases i <;> norm_num <;> ring
#align leibniz_cross leibniz_cross
jacobi_cross:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/-- Jacobi identity: For a cross product of three vectors,
    their sum over the three even permutations is equal to the zero vector. -/
theorem jacobi_cross (u v w : Fin 3 → R) :
    cross_product u (cross_product v w) + cross_product v (cross_product w u) + cross_product w (cross_product u v) =
      0 :=
  lie_jacobi u v w
#align jacobi_cross jacobi_cross
dot_self_cross:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.dot_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/-- The cross product of two vectors is perpendicular to the first vector. -/
@[simp]
theorem dot_self_cross (v w : Fin 3 → R) : matrix.dot_product v (cross_product v w) = 0 := by
  simp [cross_apply, vec3_dot_product, mul_sub, mul_assoc, mul_left_comm]
#align dot_self_cross dot_self_cross
dot_cross_self:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.dot_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/-- The cross product of two vectors is perpendicular to the second vector. -/
@[simp]
theorem dot_cross_self (v w : Fin 3 → R) : matrix.dot_product w (cross_product v w) = 0 := by
  rw [← cross_anticomm, Matrix.dotProduct_neg, dot_self_cross, neg_zero]
#align dot_cross_self dot_cross_self
cross_self:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
@[simp]
theorem cross_self (v : Fin 3 → R) : cross_product v v = 0 := by simp [cross_apply, mul_comm]
#align cross_self cross_self
cross_dot_cross:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.dot_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.dot_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.dot_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.dot_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.dot_product -/
/-- The scalar quadruple product identity, related to the Binet-Cauchy identity. -/
theorem cross_dot_cross (u v w x : Fin 3 → R) :
    matrix.dot_product (cross_product u v) (cross_product w x) =
      matrix.dot_product u w * matrix.dot_product v x - matrix.dot_product u x * matrix.dot_product v w :=
  by
  simp only [vec3_dot_product, cross_apply, cons_vec_append, cons_vec_bit0_eq_alt0, cons_val_one, cons_vec_alt0,
    LinearMap.mk₂_apply, cons_val_zero, head_cons, empty_vec_append]
  ring_nf
#align cross_dot_cross cross_dot_cross
cross_cross:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
theorem cross_cross (u v w : Fin 3 → R) :
    cross_product (cross_product u v) w = cross_product u (cross_product v w) - cross_product v (cross_product u w) :=
  lie_lie u v w
#align cross_cross cross_cross

cross_anticomm':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
@[simp]
theorem cross_anticomm' (v w : Fin 3 → R) : cross_product v w + cross_product w v = 0 := by
  rw [add_eq_zero_iff_eq_neg, cross_anticomm]
#align cross_anticomm' cross_anticomm'
cross_anticomm:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cross_product -/
@[simp]
theorem cross_anticomm (v w : Fin 3 → R) : -cross_product v w = cross_product w v := by simp [cross_apply, mul_comm]
#align cross_anticomm cross_anticomm
